textContent:
channels or topics that services are gonna be listening to 

 => services publish event to some channel when something happens 

NATS streaming store all events in memory by default , but can be configured to store in MySQL or Postgres
title: NATS streaming  concept
textContentHtml:
channels or topics that services are gonna be listening to 


 => services publish event to some channel when something happens 


NATS streaming store all events in memory by default , but can be configured to store in MySQL or Postgres
